name: The Hearing Device Company
overview: The Hearing Device Company was established to help you evaluate your hearing loss, lifestyle needs, and budget to determine the best plan of action for your particular situation. We offer complimentary hearing tests to determine if a hearing aid may help you, and lifetime service in our lab facility on all new hearing aid purchases. Most of the hearing aid makes and models we offer come with a 60 to 90-day trial period so you can see (hear) what you’re getting before you decide to keep them. At anytime within the trail period you may return them for a full refund or exchange them for another hearing aid brand or model, paying only the price difference and NO penalty. It’s really a no-lose situation for those looking to try hearing aids to improve their quality of life. These days, new invisible and barely-visible hearing aids are so small that nobody will know you’re wearing a hearing aid anyway. They will only suspect that you’re wearing hearing aids because you can hear better.
